snippet.title: Little Hats Trailer, Open World Gnome Survival RPG
snippet.description:
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1487800/Little_Hats/

NEW UPDATED LITTLE HATS TRAILER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4LVcJSM05ps


About:
Little Hats is an open-world survival game mixed with RPG elements, in which you play as a Gnome! Set in a magical world, you will have to survive, build, and explore, find a way to the Lowlands, and discover the truth about your origins. 

To stay up to date please check out my social media:

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/littlehatsg...
Twitter  - https://twitter.com/timvenekamp
Reddit  - https://www.reddit.com/user/LittleHat...
Discord - https://discord.com/invite/SuadgxS

Donate:
To help make the full vision for Little Hats a reality and to help continue and speed up the development process. Thank you very much. Sincerely, Tim.
https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=FCSC8LANKNE8N
